summary: This mod adds a new follower to Skyrim: a deadly, and attractive, ranger named Sera. You can find her in Whiterun by the man that\'s always yelling. No doubt she\'s dying to leave.
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod to publish, and my first standalone follower to create.
You can check out my first mod here [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34948]What Mjoll Replacer[/url]

Update: 5/16/2013 I have added a New Optional Look version, look at the screenshots to see the difference, I will label them. These screenshots also now use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267//?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa and the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30759/?]UNP Texture Blender[/url] by Svarog to clear up minor seams. Worked perfectly! You still need to meet the \"Requirements\" for this version to work.

Update: Version 1.1 - Made some minor changes to behavior, and gave her some Perks. If you want these changes - Uninstall version 1, make a clean save, install 1.1, and find her again in Whiterun.

Sera is a Nord skilled in one handed, block, archery, light armor, and little in destruction and restoration magic. She will stay a steady 10% under your PC level. 
You can find her staring down Heimskr at the shrine of Talos in Whiterun. 
Note: I have a vanilla Whiterun, if you have a mod that changes/adds to Whiterun, it might discombobulate her placement.

For whatever reason, if you cannot find her, check her load order in Data Files on the Skyrim Launcher or NMM, open up the console with the tilde key \"~\" and type:
prid xx000d63 [Enter] 
(xx = the load order of the a1Sera.esp in your game, for example, she is 54th in my load order, so her RefID in my game is 54000d63)
moveto player [Enter]

Now she should pop up pretty close to you once you exit the console. If she doesn\'t, try fast traveling to another area and repeat the process.

I use UFO for my followers, though it should not be required.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii[/url]
I recommend putting this below, in the load order, any follower mod that you use.

Requirements:
1. Skyrim patch 1.8 or higher
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url] Newest version (1.5 Full?)

Optional Mods: (If you want her to resemble the screenshots as much as possible)
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body by dimon99 (Skinny Version)[/url]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092]ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture by Aron[/url]

Armor Mods in Screenshots:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]Leah armor set from Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation by brokefoot[/url]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31813]West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor UNP UNPB BBP by brokefoot[/url]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33774]Osare HotPants - UNP by anano[/url]

Install:
Extract to your data folder.
Make sure you have a1Sera.esp \"checked\" in Data Files on the Skyrim Launcher.
Delete the files to uninstall.
OR, hopefully you can use NMM to install.

Credit:
To all the authors of the mods listed above, and to their co-authors as well. Thanks for some great mods!
author: SeaverWhat
